name: log-analyser
description: An application to view formatted XML log files by dragging and dropping them. It parses the XML and displays the data in a clean, readable table.
author: AI Assistant

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy:sql
scripts.serve: npm run build:css && npm run copy:sql && concurrently "npm run build:css -- --watch" "esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --jsx=automatic --servedir=. --serve=:3000"
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder
scripts.dist:32: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --ia32
scripts.dist:64: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --x64
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --publish always
